summary: Play as the Kothringi in a lore friendly way with balanced, Imperious-style abilities.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=6][b]Kothringerious - Kothringi of Skyrim[/b][/size][/color]


[size=3]Kothringerious implements Black Marsh's Kothringi as a playable race in a lore friendly way. [/size]


[b][center][size=6]I have begun a mod that is going to add NPCs of my various races throughout Skyrim. [/size][size=6][color=#000000]If you would like to contribute to the project, either as a quest scripter, writer, or even a dungeon designer, send me a message![/color]
[b]You can find updates on the Zebsirious NPC Expansion as well as any of my other projects [url=https://zebsimods.blogspot.com/]here[/url]﻿![/b][/size][/center]

[color=#000000][size=5]This mod is out of date. An updated version can be found [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88919]here[/url]﻿, as part of my Zebsirious race compilation.[/size][/color][/b][color=#999999][size=5][b]Features[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=3]A new playable race, the Kothringi[/size]
[*][size=3]Imperious-style stats and abilities[/size]
[/list]
[size=4][b][color=#999999]Kothringi skill bonuses[/color][/b]
[/size]
Alteration +10
One Handed +10
Block +5
Illusion +5
Light Armor +5 
Smithing +5

[size=4][b][color=#999999]Stats and abilities[/color][/b]

[/size]Health: 105
Magicka: 100
Stamina: 95
Health regeneration: 0.5%
Magicka regeneration: 3.125%
Stamina regeneration: 5.25%
Carry Weight: 300

[list]
[*][b]Cohesion[/b]: You may bolster your skin with ores, gaining temporary buffs.
[*][b]Metallic[/b]: You take less damage, and are resistant to poison and disease.
[*][b]Refraction[/b]: You have a small chance to reflect an incoming spell, negating its effects.
[/list]
[b][color=#999999]Quest reward - Craft 40 armor pieces to unlock[/color][/b]
[b]Solidify[/b]: [i]1/day - [/i]Recome invulnerable for 20 seconds.

[size=4][b][color=#999999]Cohesion[/color]

[/b][/size]At a smelter, you can melt down 3 ores of most kinds to create a solution,  which when used, grants a unique buff for 1 hour. Effects do not stack.

[list]
[*][b]Corundum Solution[/b]: Power attacks cost 20% less.
[*][b]Ebony Solution[/b]: Skills increase 20% faster.
[*][b]Gold Solution[/b]: Prices are 20% better.
[*][b]Iron Solution[/b]: Block 20% more damage.
[*][b]Malachite Solution[/b]: Spells do 20% more damage.
[*][b]Moonstone Solution[/b]: Spells cost 20% less.
[*][b]Orichalcum Solution[/b]: Weapons do 20% more damage.
[*][b]Quicksilver Solution[/b]: Movement speed is increased.
[*][b]Silver Solution[/b]: Resist magic 20%
[/list]
[b][color=#999999][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color]
[/b]
[list]
[*][size=2]Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=2]Update 1.9[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility.esm[/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]﻿ (overwrite the files in RacialCompatibility with TMPhoenix's files)[/size]
[/list]
[color=#999999][size=4][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]

There shouldn't be any incompatibilities, but any  mods that edit the human races, specifically the Bretons, will also edit the Kothringi, not that that's necessarily a bad thing.

[size=4][b][color=#999999]Permissions[/color][/b]
[/size]
As long as I am credited and notified, you may, without my permission:
[list]
[*][size=2]Upload translations of this mod[/size]
[*][size=2]Make compatibility patches for this mod[/size]
[*][size=2]Port this mod over to SSE[/size]
[/list]
If you'd like to use assets of this mod for any other reason, you must get my permission first. 

[b][color=#999999][size=4]Recommended[/size] [size=4]Mods[/size][/color][/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87874]Dwemerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Dwemer race mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88418]Falmerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Snow Elf race mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88501]Maormerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Maormer race mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88637]Lilmotherious [/url]- My Imperious-esque Lilmothiit race mod

[size=4][b][color=#999999]Credits[/color][/b]

[/size]EnaiSiaion for [size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61218]inspiration and a couple scripts[/url][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10195/]
[/url]expired6978 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility[/url]
TMPhoenix for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]
author: Zebsi

files.name: Kothringerious - Kothringi of Skyrim
files.changelogHtml:
Changed the cohesion buffs from 25% to 20%
Changed the quest objective of crafting 20 armor pieces to crafting 40 armor pieces
